1605330.name: Atlantis Adventure
1605330.description:
Atlantis Adventures an action adventure game.

▣ You can explore the lost continent of Atlantis.




Jenny, the heroine, meets a clue to Atlantis, where the lost treasures live and breathe.

I suggest going on an adventure with her best friend and colleague, Soldier, who has ventured with us.

Such a great adventure begins !!!!!


Atlantis Adventure is an action adventure game.



Hunting monsters from different ages in search of Atlantis treasures

◇ Join the great and immense adventure !!!!!



============================================================

• Diverse Jurassic Dinosaurs Together for the First Time

• Win the battle against sharp and fierce raptors !!!

• Defeat the Giant Tyrannosaurus !!! ( T-Rex )

• Destroy the vicious ancient stone monsters !!!

• Detonate the golden monster, the middle boss monster !!!

• Survive the gruesome battles with ancient giant stone statue monsters !!!

• Colorful ancient beautiful backgrounds and structures

▶▷ Extensive adventure with a story

==============================================================

◇ Three or more weapon systems (automatic switching according to battle)


Battle with various monsters living in a colorful background
Explore the remains of the living Atlantis

Well, let's go on an adventure together !!!!!
